name: Poker Solitaire!
description:
Combined with the strategy and fun of Poker with the ease of Solitaire, Poker Solitaire is a game that draws you in and keeps you playing for hours.

Place cards from the deck and try to build the best poker hands in each row and column.

Drag and drop played cards onto other played cards to find the best hands in every direction. It's the best card puzzle!

Build up to the highest score you can and then submit your score to Game Center.

Can you beat the highest score on the high score list? Can you beat your best score? Download and play today.
